meanings.sent1: The cricketers practiced their batting skills in the field.
meanings.sent2: We watched the cricketers compete in the championship match.
meanings.sent3: The cricketers tried to play cricket with a watermelon instead of a ball.
meanings.sent4: The cricketers were like skilled artists painting their cricket match with precise shots.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cricketers in their colorful uniforms stayed in my mind long after the game ended.

meanings.sent1: Many cricketers gathered at the stadium for the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The cricketers celebrated their victory with a team dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cricketers' hats flew off as they ran to catch the ball.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of cricketers, each one a star shining in their own right.
meanings.sent5: The sound of applause filled the air as the cricketers walked onto the pitch.
